customer_number.description: Unique identifier assigned to each Veedol customer; use this as the primary key to join with sales dataset

distribution_channel.description: Abbreviation of Sales distribution channel under which the customer operates [AM, DE, EC, EN, EX, IN, OE, OS, ST, SV]

customer_name.description: Registered business name of the customer

state.description: State in which the customer is located.

customer_group_name.description: Sub category of distribution channel.[AA CNG Stockiest, AA-CP, AA-DD, E-COMM, ENEOS- IND, ENEOS-AA CP, ENEOS-ENTI, ENEOS-OEM FF, ENEOS-OEM SF, EXPORT, INST-CP, INST-DC, Miscellaneous, OEM -Customer, OEM-FF, OEM-FW, OTHER, Service]

customer_group_report.description: Human readable distribution channel specifically for management and performance reporting [AFTER MARKET, ECOMM, ENEOS, EXPORTS,INSTITUTIONAL, OEM, OTHER SALES, SERVICES, STOCK TRANSFER]

region.description: Geographic region where the customer is located

area_incharge.description: Area Incharge responsible for managing the customer at a local or territory level

area_manager.description: Area Manager overseeing multiple Area Incharges or territories that include this customer

senior_manager.description: Senior Manager responsible for a broader cluster of areas or regions including this customer

regional_manager.description: Regional Manager accountable for business performance across a defined region that includes this customer

business_head.description: Business Head overseeing the business line or channel to which this customer belongs

all_india_head.description: All India Head responsible for nationwide oversight of the business segment associated with this customer
